game.name: Tape Us Out
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Tape Us Out is an asymmetric, online co-op puzzle game. Players are sucked into a VHS tape and must face challenges of logic, coordination, and communication within the universe of old movies to find their way back to reality.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tape Us Out is an asymmetric, online co-op puzzle game. Players are sucked into a VHS tape and must face challenges of logic, coordination, and communication within the universe of old movies to find their way back to reality.
